The MyTRX - TRON Coin extension is designed for simple and comfortable management of the TRX coin in the Tron digital network.

For those who decided to start working with Tron (TRX) for the first time, and even if you are an experienced trader and have been seriously involved in this interesting asset for a long time, we invite you to use the new, convenient and easy-to-manage MyTRX extension - TRON Coin.

The MyTRX - TRON Coin extension is very light, fast and unpretentious, installing the extension is available in a few seconds, the simplest and most convenient form of authorization will allow you to log into your account in the TRON network in a matter of seconds and start working with the TRX coin, which is the network–¢s own internal currency TRON.
The TRON network allows its users to freely manage their internal currency TRX.

Tron what is it?
A digital project developing a decentralized ecosystem and tools for working with the third generation Internet (web3).
Users can earn money by hosting decentralized applications and entertainment content for free in the ecosystem.

With the MyTRX - TRON Coin extension, working on the TRON network is convenient and fast.
